channel.title: Fixing Java security (Webclient not loading due to Java)
channel.description: This occurs in the new Java update, don't worry here's a simple solution! [u]How to fix[/u] [b]Start>Control panel[/b] Then Search "[b]Java[/b]" open it Click "[b]Security[/b]" at the top And then you should see the security level, [b]put it on medium at the bottom[/b], [b]click[/b] "[b]Apply[/b]" and then click "[b]Ok[/b]" then after this [b]Close all webpages and load the webclient (Y) [/b]

item.title: Fixing Java security (Webclient not loading due to Java)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“562711nerd, post:3, topic:539057”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=657894.msg4400742#msg4400742 date=1390584106]
This isn’t even an informative post. No one cares that you copied text from Rune-server. Yes, they have tutorials on how to do this.

Also, this isn’t a “fix”. An easier fix would be to just not update.
[/quote]
I didn’t even copy it from that shite, I just thought I’d pass it on + I typed it myself since well I’ve seen allot of people having trouble with the Java Security[/quote]
That would be because they don’t read oracles blog posts and such. Because they talked about this security update months before it was even released.
https://blogs.oracle.com/java-platform-group/entry/new_security_requirements_for_rias
^^^Posted September 2013.

Read full topic
item.source: Fixing Java security (Webclient not loading due to Java)

item.source: Fixing Java security (Webclient not loading due to Java)

item.title: Fixing Java security (Webclient not loading due to Java)
item.dc:creator: @562711nerd 562711nerd
item.description:
@562711nerd wrote:

This occurs in the new Java update, don’t worry here’s a simple solution!
How to fix
Start>Control panel
Then Search “Java” open it
Click “Security” at the top
And then you should see the security level, put it on medium at the bottom, click “Apply” and then click “Ok” then after this
Close all webpages and load the webclient (Y)

Read full topic
item.source: Fixing Java security (Webclient not loading due to Java)
